mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, name, nickname, email, birth_date AS birthDate, gender, introduction, profile_img AS profileImg, created_at AS createdAt FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, introduction = #{introduction}, profile_img = COALESCE(#{profileImg}, profile_img) WHERE user_id = #{userId}
